objects.description: Later implants used by [APT28](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0007), such as [CHOPSTICK](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0023), use a blend of HTTP, HTTPS, and other legitimate channels for C2, depending on module configuration.(Citation: FireEye APT28)(Citation: Cybersecurity Advisory GRU Brute Force Campaign July 2021)
